description:
Everyone’s favorite foul-mouthed angels sneak into Garter Belt’s secret dungeon and read his diary. For an encore, the scandalous divas sit on the couch and bitch about being hungry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Once Upon a Time in Garterbelt / Nothing to Room
Once Upon a Time... in Garterbelt / Nothing to Room
ワンス・アポン・ア・タイム・イン・ガーターベルト / ナッシング・トゥ・ルーム
원스 어폰 어 타임 인 가터벨트 / 나띵 두 룸
